technology consumer electronics media and communications retail and ecommerce travel and transportation energy and publicsector Roles Responsibilities Upgraded from Salesforce classic to lightning Developed Lightning apps using lightning Components and made them compatible with salesforce1 mobile app Performed migration on Notes and attachments from classic to lightning using packages Lightning Visualforce pages between Classic and lightning Experience working across various SFDC implementations that are covering Sales cloud Service Cloud and Apttus CPQ Customizing the Apttus product configurator and quote application according to business needs Designed and developed Visual Force pages based on the custom requirement I also worked on Apttus Advanced Workflow approvals Apttus order management created agreement wizards validation rules contract templates Worked on various objects Related to APTTUS Configuration Pricing management like Agreement Incentive Price Rule Price Rule entry Price Rule Set Strong understanding of Salesforce CPQ capabilities and limitations and can clearly communicate those to customers Built Visual Force Leasing Calculator to calculate the monthly payments based on the total amount financed and residual value Developed Amortization table and included in the VF Leasing calculator to calculate the interest paid and remaining balance Wrote Apex Triggers to implement business logic which sends emails to the vendor banks for credit check and Quote processing Designed and deployed custom Objects Custom tabs validation rules and AutoResponse rules for automating various steps in leasing Created several work flows and approval processes needed in different stages of actual quote processing Worked on SFDC standard Objects like Accounts Contacts Cases Leads and Campaigns etc Developed email templates which pulls all the data from the customer record Worked on tools like Work bench Data loader Demand tools Informatica for mass updates import and export of data Involved in Lead management which is important part in HDD business and worked on workflows for updating leads based on the lead scoring from Eloqua Organized meetings with stake holders to provide information on progress and critical milestones of the project Closely worked with SFDC Admins and Business Analysts in the Org involved in integration and merging two salesforce instances Sales Service Cloud Migrations Worked on Partner Communities and implemented Sales portal home page into Salesforce using VF html Java Script CSS Ajax Developed various batch classes for evaluating certain criteria and updating data using Data Manipulation Language Developed and scheduled various Batch Apex classes using Apex Schedulable classes on hourly basis Designed and deployed Custom tabs validation rules Approval Processes and AutoResponse Rules for automating business logic Worked on scheduling data loading and transformations using SQL Server Integration Services SSIS between different maintenance systems Created ETL packages using SSIS to move data from various heterogeneous data sources Created logs for ETL load at package level and task level to log number of records processed by each package and each task in a package using SSIS Involved in Data cleaning record deduping and Data reconciliation during migration Involved in Webinars training sales persons how to use the application Involved in the Data Transformation and Data Cleansing activities while transferring the data to the external system using Informatics on Demand Implemented SFDC Integration using REST SOAP Web Service APIS Integrated with external system using Web Services callouts for cleansing the Address and save the data in the pages of Salesforcecom and SOAP and REST based Web Services for extracting the data from external systems to display in the pages of Salesforcecom Worked on Change sets Packages Eclipse ANT migration tool for deploying apps and several other components Experienced in using Forcecom Migration Tools and includes change sets and continuous integration using Jenkins SVN CVS Forcecom Migration tool Involved in automation process using various tools like Jenkins  etc Managed Offshore team of three developers and tracked the progress Agile Development Methodology was followed for the implementation Involved in gathering business and technical requirements for leasing quote automation and build the application right from the scratch and deploy it to production Used the sandbox for testing and migrated the code to the deployment instance after testing Involved with Salesforcecom Premier Support and handled the support cases with the help Salesforcecom support Environment Saleforcecom platform Lightning Apttus CPQ Health Tracking Product uses a Server that reads the data from various interfaces and will be saved into database First user need to create a userid through the WEB UI to interact with server that runs on tomcat After login the user enters the data points which will be used to show the graphs for different time variants like for the past 1 week 2 weeks 1 month Through IM one predefined buddy is running at our server User need to add this buddy name to interact with our server An alert system in place to alert the user through Email or SMS for mobile or IM send message to IM userid if the data point is out of range We have another important feature called Scheduler User can use this to schedule for reminders Responsibilities Developed necessary interfaces modules and functions to satisfy all requirements Developed some of the modules for the whole system based on Model View Controller MVC using the Struts framework extensively Extensively developed supporting Java Beans Components Developed the frontend screens using JSP XSL and HTML Extensively used several J2EE features for the development of Application Extensively used Design patterns such as Singleton Factory and MVC Written JSP Custom Tags for view layer of the application Indepth knowledge and experience in implementing Service Oriented Architecture SOA using XML based SOAPRESTful web services
